309.question: What was the performance of their model?
309.response: {'Answer': 'The model "Ours with Mask and Ordered Triplets" performed best with a F1 score of 93.54 and a GM score of 61.36 on the Test-Repeated dataset. The model achieved an F1 score of 90.22 and a GM score of 41.81 on the Test-New dataset.'}
309.answer: For test-repeated set, EM score of 61.17, F1 of 93.54, ED of 0.75 and GM of 61.36. For test-new set, EM score of 41.71, F1 of 91.02, ED of 1.22 and GM of 41.81

312.question: How were the navigation instructions collected?
312.response: {'Answer': 'The navigation instructions were collected from humans who performed the actual navigation in a real environment.'}
312.answer: using Amazon Mechanical Turk using simulated environments with topological maps
